1.content:
I arrived in the afternoon with taxi. The new house was located in a cul-de-sac in the suburbs just outside of Anthropolis. Thanks to the new credit card i received in mail from the bank of Furplanet i was able to pay the driver and got out of the taxi. And then i looked at the new house, which was a bit bigger than i thought, and it´s even cheaper than the old house! Then i started to think back to Earth...

I am always happy when my family is around, especially the love of my life: Marian. She´s a beautiful and talented woman. We met when started at college 25 years ago and it was love at first sight and 20 years ago we got married and 3 years after that we had our first child. In total we have three: Gloria (17), Martin (15) and Hannah (13). We all lived in Juneau, Alaska where i worked at the university of Alaska Southeast. Even though Marian could have any job she wanted, she rather stayed at home being a housewife and take care of the kids.
Marian and i celebrated our wedding-anniversary with a dinner and making love on our bed while the kids have sleepovers with their friends, and in the next morning i received a letter from the university of Anthropolis offering me a job, they even sent an advanced monthly payment which is more than i earn in a year! Furplanet was known to be a really nice place, clean air, beautiful nature and no crimes anywhere. Marian and the kids got really exited and encouraged me to accept.

That was two weeks ago.

It was decided that i would go ahead and make sure everything set while Marian and the kids visits her parents in Canada (she is born canadian) for a week. I arrived an hour later thanks to Furplanet-made spaceship, even though there´re was a light-year distance between us! And now here i am.

The house seemed bigger inside. It has four bedrooms (Gloria and Hannah complained about having their own rooms), one guest room, a study (perfect for me!), a living room, a big kitchen with a dining room, an attic, and a beautifully green backyard (when Marian sees this, she´ll wanna plant a garden right away!). All the beds and the furnitures was already set up by the movers while the rest are still in the boxes.

And now i standing on the front yard looking over the cul-de-sac. The sky was clear blue without a cloud on sight, and with the warmth reminded me of the family-trip to California. The houses around me looked the same as mine but in other colors. And when i looked at the house opposite of mine i froze.

Outside the garage there are three flamingo-girls washing a car. They looked almost the same and wearing same daisy dukes but different bikini tops, i suspect they´re sisters. The way they wash the car reminds of a YouTube-video i caught my son watching last year. I also noticed another thing: they look old enough to be his daughters, but their bodies would put a model to shame! Their breasts are VERY big!. Then they notice me, giving me a strange look. And suddenly one of the girls held a soap in the air with both hands (or...paws?), squeezed and let it all drop on her breasts. My mouth got wide open, my eyes widened and my pants is getting a bit uncomfortable...

"Hey there neighbor!" i heard feminine voice shout from my right. I turned my head and saw a female dalmatian jogging to my direction. I couldn't help but watch as her breasts bounced around. When she got about ten feet she slowed down and reached out her right paw.
"I´m Judy. Judy Dalma", That´s a name in english, to make it easier for humans. They already have names in the language humans can´t use.
I politely shake her paw, "Alan. Alan Turner"
Judy Dalma; "Nice to finally meet a human in our neighborhood", she turned to the flamingo-girls for a moment and shouted "Hey! I thought you were gonna clean the car, not your tits!", the girls giggled while i blushed from hearing that.
Alan Turner; "I guess i´m the first human in the area. Heh"
Judy; "Oh yeah, and it´s nice to have a MAN around here too", that got me a bit confused and she´s eyeing me up and down, "well, i gotta go home and take my shower, see ya!" she walked around me and when she got 12-feet away she turned 180 and said "if you plan on jogging, let me know!" and disappeared into her house.

I went back inside and started to unpack some of the boxes (i have the whole week until my family arrives) started filling the living room. Then i finally noticed a few boxes labeled "WELCOME". I opened up a small one and found many brochures for a lot of attractions, restaurants, theaters, malls, parks...nightclubs? I opened another one to find a bunch of furry... PORN?! I better send this one back to whoever sent this! And i opened the last one, a big one, only to find a lot of bathrobes. Female bathrobes, that looks a whole lot different from the robes I've seen. I better return this one too. And now i got thinking... because i was so amazed of the spaceship, the planet, the city even the house, that i didn't notice the females around me during the trip. Was the taxi driver male or female, i didn't know. And that got me thinking about the flamingos and the dalmatian. Are all females like that? I decided to continue unpacking, starting with my laptop (Mac).

Then it turned to night. And to my surprise it started raining. I guess i have to check the weather report more often. It´s now 8pm and I've already unpacked for the living room, the kitchen and the bathroom, so i decided to sit on the couch with my laptop. An hour later i heard the doorbell ring. "Who could that be? At this hour?" i thought. When i opened the door i got a breathtaking sight: two females in wet clothes! One is a blond, chocolate furred poodle with a tight pink t-shirt and a pair of tight jeans and the other is a white furred, red-haired cat with a shirt and a pair of jeans they both have wide hips and breasts that seemed like two pairs of basketballs!
The cat; "Sorry to disturb you this late, but a greedy bitch abandoned us nearby and, well, we got lost"
The Poodle; "Can we come in so we can dry up? Please?", she looked at me with cute puppy eyes.
I´m not the kind of person who would not help people in need, and i do have a box strange bathrobes. So I decided: "come in and i´ll call a taxi". But what i didn't know was that it´s gonna be a looong night...



(QUESTION FROM THE AUTHOR: will you keep following Alan? Or his son Martin? Or maybe other male humans and furries?)

info.description:
"If you think a town of horny, female furries might be a lot to handle... Imagine a whole planet of them!" -- Falcon


No one would have thought in 2017 that aliens would come in contact with us. A Civilization of furries wanted to form alliances and trade agreements with Earth. The furries lived on the planet called Furplanet. Since then humans started to take vacations to the exotic Furplanet while furries take vacations to Earth. In 2020 a few human families started to actually move to Furplanet.
One of which is 43-year-old Alan Turner with his wife Marian and their children.

Alan is a loving father and a happily married man who works as a teacher in the university of Alaska Southeast while Marian is a happy housewife. They believe nothing could come between them and Alan loves his wife and has no reason to cheat on her.
